channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: A @benyehudapress title shows up on this viral Instagram video forwarded me by my daughter with the note, "You're famous!" https://t.co/9afrDpdlPi
Maybe everything that dies someday comes back. https://t.co/oxo3VPMWg0
@abbymachines @whstancil Having refused to confront the likelihood that Republican pro-covid arguments are offered in bad faith, they’ve tacitly accepted them.
@whstancil https://t.co/T8iks5WfYC
@EladNehorai https://t.co/T8iks5WfYC
@AynRand_is_Dead @doctorow Send in the clones.
Speaking of undeterred criminals… https://t.co/WnQgksA6P1
Among those backing Mandel: AIPAC’s Howard Friedman, Home Depot co-founder Bernie Marcus, and the Millstein’s. https://t.co/4mlDtwszmd
@typolad You would think she would prefer Enterprise reruns. Or is that speciest of me?

@prof_dainy In faith, perhaps, but not in works.
@prof_dainy Here’s three prohibitions you probably haven’t violated. https://t.co/zFZIER0mve
@prof_dainy On a scale of 0-613, we’re all in the middling range.
@DebbyTeicher @BillGusky He must have appreciated that marketing assist.
@cstross I'm not saying these are the end times, but when the Venus Flytraps being raised by a writer of nuclear- and Lovecraftian- horror up and commit suicide, one has to wonder.
@aschleighj2022 @drvolts Because ultimately they feel closer to older white Republicans than they do to the younger, less white Democrats who are also the ones don't think "America is already great."
@MattFriedmanNJ Demographically, no. Geographically, yes. Personally, only if they agree to support MTA extension across the Hudson.

@DavidAstinWalsh I am once again reminded of how sensible, moderate leaders of Orthodox Judaism predicted 30 years ago that their opposition to gays would attract the masses of non-Orthodox Jews who would revolt against the tolerant mainstream culture.
@DavidAstinWalsh In fact, the tolerant culture infiltrated Orthodoxy and moderate yeshivas have to respond to students who are vocal allies of their gay peers.
@DavidAstinWalsh How does left hedonism lead to transphobia? (And than you for your service in reading this.)
@drvolts The most charitable explanation is that pollsters told them that partisan rhetoric scares away the “swing voters” they covet. My money, however, is on less charitable explanations.
@carterbrianl @christogrozev @amanpour I bet the professional projections show a modal distribution of two to six cities nuked. It’s not just the long tail of nuclear winter that suggests caution.
In honor of William Shatner's birthday, my report of my 15 minutes on the phone with him in 2015. https://t.co/879Lxs3n9p
@trekonomics I bet the professional projections show a modal distribution of two to six cities nuked. It’s not just the long tail of nuclear winter that suggests caution.

Hard to believe this of a nation that parceled out conquered real estate based on how many captive people you brought across the ocean to slave on your behalf, but here we are. https://t.co/jdZlKYRcas
@ZacharyBraiterm @bernstein_judah What? Tablet choosing liberal democracy over traditionalism? Ukraine backlash must have them running scared.
@elivalley When you're too fundamentally antisemitic to take Zalman Bernstein Tikvahbucks.
